chess_py.core.algebraic package¶

Submodules¶

chess_py.core.algebraic.converter module¶

Methods that take external input and attempt to turn them into usable commands.

Copyright © 2016 Aubhro Sengupta. All rights reserved.

chess_py.core.algebraic.converter.init_alg(alg_str, position)[source]¶

Initializes a move from long algebraic notation

Return type:Move
chess_py.core.algebraic.converter.make_legal(move, position)[source]¶

Returns the corresponding move from all_possible_moves in Board

Return type:Move
chess_py.core.algebraic.converter.to_move(algebraic_string, input_color)[source]¶

Default constructor for initializing a move using algebraic notation.

pawn move e4 piece move Nf3 pawn capture exd5 piece capture Qxf3 Castle 00 or 000 pawn promotion e8=Q

chess_py.core.algebraic.location module¶

Class stores Locations on the Board. Locations must be on the board to be initialized properly. | rank - y coordinate from 0 to 7 | file - x coordinate from 0 to 7

rank
7 8 ║… … … … … … … …
6 7 ║… … … … … … … …
5 6 ║… … … … … … … …
4 5 ║… … … … … … … …
3 4 ║… … … … … … … …
2 3 ║… … … … … … … …
1 2 ║… … … … … … … …
0 1 ║… … … … … … … …
—-╚═══════════════
———a b c d e f g h
—–0 1 2 3 4 5 6 7
——file

Copyright © 2016 Aubhro Sengupta. All rights reserved.

chess_py.core.algebraic.move module¶

Class that stores chess moves. Destination, status and piece making move are required to initialize Move.

status - integer value describing type of move with meaning defined in notation_const.py

Copyright © 2016 Aubhro Sengupta. All rights reserved.

class chess_py.core.algebraic.move.Move(end_loc, piece, status, start_rank=None, start_file=None, string=None, promoted_to_piece=None)[source]¶
on_board()[source]¶

Determines whether move exists.

Return type:bool
out()[source]¶
would_move_be_promotion()[source]¶

Finds if move from current location would be a promotion

chess_py.core.algebraic.notation_const module¶

Class stores integer values for various types of moves in algebraic notation.

Copyright © 2016 Aubhro Sengupta. All rights reserved.

Module contents¶

chess_py.core.algebraic.to_move(algebraic_string, input_color)[source]¶

Default constructor for initializing a move using algebraic notation.

pawn move e4 piece move Nf3 pawn capture exd5 piece capture Qxf3 Castle 00 or 000 pawn promotion e8=Q
